title: Does the Bugsplat send info that I crashed out of the game?
body: I bugsplatted while loading in a ranked game, and just wanted to know if the Bugsplat sends a report that I did not intentionally DC but bugsplatted and needed to repair. I do not want to get in a low priority queue situation.

replies.body: yeah this client is terrible i just got bug splatted out of a ranked game now i have 5 20 minute leavebusters sometimes i wanna say fk this game
got out of a prio queue, bug splatted, then got another one, whoo!!

Bugsplat reports will not affect the Leaverbuster or /Remake system that would give you penalties if a trend of disconnections happens on your account. This is because regardless of intention, any disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. 

Bugsplats are often caused by system driver or hardware issues local to your PC. I recommend working through the steps in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a first step since those steps commonly resolve this issue. Let me know the results of following that guide!

Update : I did get a low priority queue
